trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Evergreen
There were no other sightings in Evergreen on or around February 13th 2006
Summary: Lighted disk hovering and moving slowly
divs: sighting detailsa lighted disk shape object was hovering west of evergreen, moving slowly. i saw it four separate times within 45 minutes. each time it hovered and then disappeared away from me or moved behind a mountain (floyd hill). i have seen this object three times\ days this week, each time in the late afternoon just before dark. the first 2 times i was driving and was not confident in what i saw. today i was outside my house facing west and had my husband come out and look too. it looked like a very bright star but it was daylight. it faded away from us to the west as we watched. i saw it 3 more times while driving to floyd hill to pick up my child from daycare.
